name: Thermostatino
tagline: A simple thermostat made with Arduino and nextion display
body:
# [Arduino](https://www.arduino.cc/) + [Nextion](http://www.itead.cc/nextion-nx3224t024.html) = Thermostatino ## [Thermostat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thermostat) home autonomation open source ### version: 1.0
building a [thermostat](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thermostat) spending less than $ 40, using [Arduino](https://www.arduino.cc/), and a [touch display](http://www.itead.cc/nextion-nx3224t024.html) [![Thermostatino](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nsrau/Thermostatino/master/docs/screen-shot.png)](https://youtu.be/FySXHoT1fyA)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
